website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, sturdy dresser with ample space and three color options. Just be prepared for time-consuming assembly.
pros: Features four spacious drawers and a classic design
Wood build feels reasonably solid, and the materials are ASTM approved
Fits nicely with most nursery decor, as it's available in white, grey, and brown
cons: Drawers have the tendency to pop open
Strange odor noted upon arrival that may fade
Takes some time to assemble, but the instructions are helpful

customer_reviews.title: nice but proceed with caution
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a nightmare to assemble... But the finished product is nice looking and seems very sturdy. We purchased the optional changer top which should have had pre drilled holes along the back for but they were more like indents... when I went to screw it on I heard cracking. You can't see damage from front but fair warning if you do plan to put the changer on this, PRE DRILL!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cute. Easy to build.. check out the photos.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 37 weeks pregnant 5'3. I boxed and assembled i without a problem. Highly recommend using the Manuel book and sorting things out carefully. This will prevent breaking the wood. **only disappointment is that the bottom drawer isn't closing on the right hand side.... :/ . I removed and reinstalled and still it's doing the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: dream catcher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this dresser!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is worth every penny. It’s gorgeous, sturdy, and the assembly was really simple. I put it together on my own in about an hour and a half and I was 32 weeks pregnant at the time. I replaced the knobs just to add a little bit of flair but the original knobs were totally fine. The finish is beautiful and the drawers open and close smoothly. I am so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Drawers Don't Close Completely
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a thick durable dresser. However, if you prefer your drawers to be able to close 100%, don't get this dresser. After 3 hours of assembly, it's a very dissatisfying feeling to put the final pieces in, the drawers, and have them not close all the way. Only 1 out of 4 drawers closed 100%. We've tried fixing it for another 2 hours - no luck. If you don't care about drawers closing though - it's honestly a really nice dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Krista K

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was given this product to review and share my experience. We were very pleased by the quality of the item - very sturdy, well built and beautiful. While the assembly may take about 2 hours, the instructions are easy to follow. We love that this came with wall attachments for extra safety. The only thing we wish was different the fact that the drawer rollers come pre-installed this limits some of the ability of the drawers to close perfectly - but it saves you the headache of attaching them yourself. Overall we are very happy with this dresser.
customer_reviews.author: mindfulofmed

customer_reviews.title: Great dresser
customer_reviews.text: ,Just assembled this dresser yesterday. We love color and the quality of the material. It was extremely easy to put together. The instructions were very simple and follow, easy to product overall. We were very satisfied with the quality of the item: very durable, well built and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Glencys

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's ok, but I'm not expecting this to last more than a couple of years. I'm surprised by the comments that called it sturdy or solid, maybe if your standards are Target-level quality? The biggest quality issue with it are the drawers popping out; they don't actually stay shut. Doesn't matter if the drawers are empty or full. My husband has assembled a lot of furniture before and he was really disappointed by the quality of the parts, we may just end up going to buy different sliders for the drawers to see if that solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Stalker Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: The instructions were easy to follow though
customer_reviews.text: The dresser did take a long time to put together. The reviews we read before buying it said the same thing. The instructions were easy to follow though. The hardest part was putting together the drawers. Some of the holes didn’t line up as they should. One of the handles did not work, but they sent an extra so we used that. The dresser looks great and seems sturdy. We also got a Serta crib in dark chocolate and they match great. Dark chocolate looks great. Dust shows up real well on it though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie V

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Required!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! This dresser comes in about 120 pcs, Assembly is a nightmare!!!!! I am very mechanically inclined and it took me 2.5 hrs to assemble this, there is not a single pc of this together, comes in a flat box! Quality is not what I would expect for a 300.00 dresser either, we will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and great price
customer_reviews.text: The perfect finishing touch to our sweet girls bedroom. Very heavy solid piece. Took about 2 hours for my husband to assemble from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is a cute dresser, but for the price I expected more. As other posters have mentioned, it seems more difficult to assemble than other similar furniture. And again, asnother reviews mentioned, the drawers don’t quite close perferfectly. Overall, I like the size and style.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: All piecs arrived in good condition. Took awhile to put together and had ...
customer_reviews.text: All piecs arrived in good condition. Took awhile to put together and had more pieces than expected but it looks nice now that it's finished and I'm happy with the quality as it's nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put this together at 7 months pregnant
customer_reviews.text: If I can put this thing together by myself at 7 months pregnant anyone can! Yes it’s similar to ikea but the directions are better. You get what you pay for but I definitely think it’s worth it! It’s sturdy! I almost didn’t buy it because of the reviews but I’m glad I gave it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality dresser
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. Bought the first in April 2016 for my daughters nursery and just bought the second in July for my newborn sons clothes. Simple but sturdy design. Good quality with soft close drawers. Since it is all wood it is a bit heavy but I like that because I expect it to last a long time. Can't comment too much on the ease of assembly but my husband was able to put it together within 2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dresser to match crib!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived intact, no damage, all hardware in the box. Just a wee bit of struggle for the bottom drawer but nothing that wasn't easily rectified by asking for assistance in assembly! Fast shipping! Absolutely LOVE this dresser and it goes perfect with the crib!
customer_reviews.author: A very happy wife!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful drawers
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful drawers very sturdy and great quality I bought these for my daughters room and they look perfect. I did need help assembling but I’m not the best at putting furniture together.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: High quality and simple to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my son and daughter-in-law for a baby changing dresser. They were very impressed with the quality of construction, ease of assembly, and durable finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Record

customer_reviews.title: Easiest piece of furniture to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Putting together a nursery so we had so many pieces of furniture to assemble and by far this was the easiest. Every hole was perfectly aligned and predrilled, the tools it came with made getting bolts in at weird angles effortless. The end result is a heavy and sturdy piece of furniture. I can't day enough good things.
customer_reviews.author: clinton t vickery

customer_reviews.title: This is a good dresser, but it came with scratches on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good dresser, but it came with scratches on the back. Also, as we were building one of the drawers, we noticed the little holes for screws were located in the wrong place (I've attached examples of what it should and shouldn't be) There were also scratches on the backside of our dresser and a bubble I guess you would call it. Directions were okay, but pictures could've been better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: This was much easier to build than other furniture that I have purchased online, AND it looks nicer because of this. :)
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Mine was broken
customer_reviews.text: This looks like it would be a great dresser. Mine was delivered broken.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shade of Grey
customer_reviews.text: Love this pretty dresser! It is the perfect shade of grey. It is perfect for a boy's or girl's nursery, and it even works as they get older. It is very sturdy and well made and I'm so happy with this purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Walkinginmemphisinhighheels

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This dresser was very easy to assemble, the instructions were clear and the quality was much higher than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: All of the pieces came in excellent condition! The dresser is bigger than I had imagined which is a plus. It is also very sturdy and good quality. Although, it was very time consuming to put together. I feel like some of the parts could have already been pieced together to make assembly easier.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good dresser
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy. Reinforced bar on the drawers helps. There were a TON of pieces to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: SMackey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great
customer_reviews.text: Took about two hours to assemble myself. Worth it though- it's very sturdy and fits perfectly with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Like most of the previous reviews stated
customer_reviews.text: The dresser arrived well packed in a box that was slightly damaged. The dresser itself was undamaged. Like most of the previous reviews stated, this thing comes in quite a few pieces and took about 2 hours for me to put together by myself. I have not had issues with the drawers not closing correctly. It's a nice piece for the price. Exactly as pictured on Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: jrxba

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer, Nice Dresser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dresser. Although I have yet to use it on a daily basis, it seems like decent quality. Directions and asembly were easy to follow by myself with very little help from my husband (there are times when two people are required). Very happy with my purchase thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Dresser
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this dresser for my daughter’s room. It came fairly quickly and was super easy to put together. I love how it looks in her room and how spacious it is to fit all my daughter’s clothes in it!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dresser !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed! This drawer is more beautiful in person! The color is beautiful!!! And the quality is AMAZING , Very sturdy , and well built , it was very easy to put together , it came with instructions easy to follow !!
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Cute Dresser!
customer_reviews.text: This dresser is so nice! The instructions made it easy to understand how to set it up. This dresser is high quality for its price! Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Wood
customer_reviews.text: It’s not wood. I know this because my house flooded and the bottom of the dresser soaked the water right up and it’s now swollen and needs to be replaced. Real wood does not swell. Particle board swells. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Melody A.

customer_reviews.title: Needs time to build; well worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the dresser and we're using as a towel storage unit in our main bathroom. It's well constructed, but one of the most time intense projects I've done in a while.
customer_reviews.author: whs

customer_reviews.title: Much chest and equal if not better quality to the higher prices at babys are us
customer_reviews.text: Matches perfectly to the crib in the set. Much chest and equal if not better quality to the higher prices at babys are us.
customer_reviews.author: N Young

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat real wood
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best investments I’ve ever made purchasing a piece of furniture. Used in our nursery, this dresser is durable, quality, and nicely painted. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Karlskin

customer_reviews.title: part configured wrong
customer_reviews.text: i can't even comment on customer support b/c they're only open 30 hours week. one of the parts has the holes punched incorrectly rendering the product useless. we'll see how they resolve.
customer_reviews.author: JWG

customer_reviews.title: Broken Parts, Delayed Shipping
customer_reviews.text: The dresser comes with broken parts, support is via email only. Delayed shipping, hopefully they will send me new parts sooner so I can have the dresser ready before baby come.
customer_reviews.author: Gelz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a little tricky to assemble but we love this dresser for my daughters room. Fits very nicely in smaller bedrooms also
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: much better price than the freshly out of business Toys R ...
customer_reviews.text: much better price than the freshly out of business Toys R Us aka Toys that Rip U Off. Solid build and lots of space!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. The drawer doesn't perfectly align, but looks good and operate well.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Worst VOC's of any product I've ever assembled
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a headache during assembly, and after 7 days of open windows and a fan running 24/7, the room still smells. Should never be marketed as furniture for a nursery or young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Telemark Fitness

customer_reviews.title: How long does the smell lasts? I had mine ...
customer_reviews.text: How long does the smell lasts? I had mine from Thanksgiving and had been having the drawers open all the time, had charcoal bags in each drawer, and put plants in the baby’s room. But the smell is still very strong!!!! I’m very concerned about this smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and really solid dresser!
customer_reviews.text: It took me 3hours from unpackaging the dresser, to total completion. That being said this dresser is Solid! Easy to assemble, and only one complaint from me. On the first step they have a piece that has sliders but in the pictures they don't show the placement of the sliders, i guessed correctly but if i had been using my brain the next picture shows the placement of the other sliders that this slider needs to match. Other than that it i was extremely happy with this dresser. It is very heavy so unless you can lift 108lbs of awkward big box, make sure you have a friend available to help move the package when it arrives
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Takes a little time to put together but good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: dave knutson

customer_reviews.title: Completely unnecessary complications in assembly process.
customer_reviews.text: I have put together probably 100 pieces of furniture in my day, and this was the most overly complicated piece to date. And you might think that something with a, literally, 47 page instruction manual and over 100 screws would be sturdy as a rock, but you'd be wrong. It's no better than a $100 piece you'd buy at Target and assemble it 20 minutes. This took me over 4 hours. I do not recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality... did take some time to put together but otherwise very pleased for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Drawers pop open
customer_reviews.text: Seems okay thus far; however, the drawers constantly pop open a tiny bit. It's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT purchase this if you plan to match it ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this if you plan to match it to other Delta/Serta furniture. I was informed by Delta/Serta that this is a stand alone piece that does not match the grays used for other Delta/Serta products. I have been informed there is nothing they are able to do to remedy the situation. I am extremely dissatisfied with the level of customer service and the quality of the product. Will NOT be purchasing from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Serta 4 Drawer Dresser, Grey
product_meta.description: Equipped with a bounty of storage space, this 4 Drawer Dresser from Serta offers timeless appeal. Fashioned with elegant arch detailing at the bottom, this sturdy dresser is outfitted with ball bearing, side mounted drawer glides with safety stops, which prevent the drawers from falling out. The wooden knobs are easy to grasp, making it the perfect addition in a child's room, yet the sophisticated styling works in adult spaces, too.
feature_bullets: Strong and sturdy wood construction 4 drawers
Anti-tip kit w/ top or base mounting Rigid wood frame
Ball bearing, side mounted drawer glides with safety stops Assembly required
Tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and ASTM safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars48 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
